DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hr_expense_header h left join xbs.hr_department h0 on h.department_id=h0.dept_id left join xbs.hr_employee_v h1 on h.hr_employee_id=h1.hr_employee_id left join xbs.hr_employee h2 on h.approved_by_employee_id=h2.hr_employee_id left join xbs.option_line o on h.status=o.option_line_id left join xbs.hr_expense_tpl_header h3 on h.expense_template_id=h3.hr_expense_tpl_header_id left join xbs.currency c on h.currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.currency c0 on h.doc_currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.org o0 on h.bu_org_id=o0.org_id left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g on h.exchange_rate_type=g.currency_conversion_type
DbDetails.Data: h.claim_number,h0.department department_id,h1.name hr_employee_id,h.claim_date,h.approved_date,h2.first_name approved_by_employee_id,o.option_line_value status,h.purpose,h3.template_name expense_template_id,c.title currency,c0.title doc_currency,h.header_amount,h.reason,h.contact_details,o0.org bu_org_id,h.created_by,h.creation_date,h.last_update_by,h.last_update_date,h.hr_expense_header_id,g.from_currency exchange_rate_type,h.exchange_rate
